meanings.sent1: I enjoy tasting different types of merlot.
meanings.sent2: The vineyard produces a delicious merlot.
meanings.sent3: The merlot grape decided to throw a party for all the other grapes.
meanings.sent4: The merlot grape stood out in the bunch like a ruby in a sea of emeralds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the merlot grape filled the air with a rich, fruity scent.

meanings.definition: A red wine made from the merlot grape.
meanings.sent1: She ordered a glass of merlot to pair with her steak.
meanings.sent2: The merlot was a perfect choice for the dinner party.
meanings.sent3: The merlot wine whispered sweet nothings to the cheese platter.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed smoothly like a glass of merlot on a summer evening.
meanings.sent5: The deep color of the merlot wine hinted at its bold flavor profile.
